sentences.en: Again the purpose of this action was to curtail inflation.
sentences.cn: 此行动的目的在于抑制通货膨胀.

sentences.en: Given this, China will continue to take measures to curtail the trend of deflation.
sentences.cn: 因此, 我们还要采取措施继续遏制通缩的趋势.

sentences.en: In all cases we'll curtail baggage handling.
sentences.cn: 在任何情况之下,我们要简化行李的发送.

sentences.en: It is necessary to curtail or alter normally coexisting stimuli.
sentences.cn: 必需消除或改变正常时并存的刺激.

sentences.en: It threatens to curtail a modest recovery in consumer spending on items like apparel and electronics.
sentences.cn: 高油价将威胁到消费者在服饰与电子产品消费上的适度复苏.

sentences.en: Several authors have noted that flower and cone production should curtail wood increment.
sentences.cn: 几位作者都注意到,花和球果的产生会削弱木材的生长.

sentences.en: The findings could lead to strategies that help curtail transmission of the disease.
sentences.cn: 该发现可能帮助我们制定出有助于降低流感传播的对策.

sentences.en: The minister had to curtail his visit.
sentences.cn: 部长不得不缩短访问日期.

sentences.en: The move to sharply curtail showings of the movie highlights China's efforts to limit foreign films.
sentences.cn: 给《阿凡达》的放映踩下刹车的举措彰显出中国限制外国电影的努力.

sentences.en: The new law will curtail police powers.
sentences.cn: 这条新法规将削弱警方的权力。

sentences.en: The President had to curtail his visit.
sentences.cn: 总统不得不缩短他的访问日期.

sentences.en: We must try to curtail our spending.
sentences.cn: 我们必须尽力缩减开支.

trans.tran_cn: 缩短， 削减， 减少
